description: This is the base interface that all Entities should implement

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this entity.  A new ID will be generated for new Entities.  Once issued, this ID is guaranteed to never change or be re-issued

uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this entity.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this entity was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

modifiedOn.description: The date this entity was last modified.
modifiedOn.title: Modified On

createdBy.description: The user that created this entity.
createdBy.title: Created By

modifiedBy.description: The user that last modified this entity.
modifiedBy.title: Modified By

annotations.description: The URI to get to this entity's annotations

accessControlList.description: The URI to get to this entity's access control list

parentId.description: The ID of the parent of this entity

entityType.description: The full class name of this entiy.
